mains.name: Sampler Platter
mains.description: The sampler is a combination of differnt menu items. Ask us what is on the Sampler today!

mains.name: Nachos Supreme
mains.description:
Corn chips smothered in our homemade vegan Rotel cheese sauce, made with dairy-free cheese, green and red chilis, walnut taco meat, and topped with pico de gallo, crema, and jalapeños. 

Upgrade to Super Nachos for +5 and get topped with your choice of vegan 'meat'.

mains.name: Quesa Tacos (3)
mains.description:
3 tortillas dipped in enchilada chili sauce, filled with vegan cheese, Sante Fé Chikun Mix ( jackfruit, onion, bell pepper, Bella mushroom, garlic), and toasted to perfection. Served with Avocado Crema & Pico De Gallo. 
Comes with flour tortillas, gluten-free option available

mains.name: Phish Sliders (3)
mains.description: Banana flowers seasoned and fried to perfection topped with our cajun coleslaw and tartar sauce.

mains.name: Kalamari (Seafood) Tacos (3)
mains.description: Vegan Calamari (Enoki mushrooms) seasoned and fried to perfection wrapped in a corn tortilla and topped with Baja slaw, TTPBK sauce, and feta crumbles!

mains.name: Caribbean Beeph Patty
mains.description: Jerk walnut meat wrapped inside a yummy biscuit crust. Jerk Empanada
